These days what I keep tuned in is the song “Chal Diye……..” from Amit Sana’s new Album “Chal Diye”. Pop number 'Chal Diye' begins the journey of Amit Sana in the world of music. I have downloaded it from net when I heard this on TV. Music is given by Vishal Shekhar who is already riding high on the success of 'Dus'. This song is a foot tapping number with strong base of melody.
Chal diyaeeeeee, Chal diye
Zindagi ko gale se laga ne
Chal diyaeeeeee, Chal diye Na socha na samjha na poojha ,
Bus Chal diye.
